article_title: Citing Regulatory Concerns, Hospitals Turn a Blind Eye to Google Glass
article_text: Marketing, which is highly quantitative, targeted, and tied to business outcomes, will likely become highly automated by 2025, says Tom Davenport, a senior advisor with Deloitte Analytics. The few people who will comprise the marketing team of the future will be responsible for ensuring that promotions are creative and for overseeing the automated systems.

twitter.description: Google Glass can be used by health care professionals to cut costs, make teaching easier, improve health outcomes or some combination of the above. But broad adoption of the Internet-connected eyewear is unlikely in the near future as long as hospitals have to find workarounds to privacy regulations.
